text: Anthony M. Dean is an American engineer and currently at Colorado School of Mines, formerly holding the W. K. Coors Distinguished Professorship. He graduated from Harvard University.https://chemeng.mines.edu/project/anthony-m- dean/ ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Colorado School of Mines faculty Category:21st-century American engineers Category:Harvard University alumni
title: Anthony M. Dean
